Title: Creates and defines the new crime of aggressive driving as a class E felony; establishes minimum one year sentence when court imposes alternative definite sentence
Summary: Creates and defines the new crime of aggressive driving as a class E felony; establishes minimum one year sentence when court imposes alternative definite sentence.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of aggressive driving
